A graphic on the clothes commonly worn by female MSU students PERIOD

I heard someone say that college students are a lot like kindergarteners and after seeing some of the fashion choices on this campus I can only agree PERIOD

Some students walked out of high school realized they could wear whatever they wanted and promptly chose all of the wrong choices at the same time PERIOD Others still fall into predictable fashion traps myself included PERIOD

I could probably ignore the whole Lululemon wave if it was for athletic purposes PERIOD If you get dressed in the morning to play tennis I have nothing but respect for your commitment PERIOD If you do not plan to go hard in theclay though ask yourself if it matches or if you put both pieces on because of the logos PERIOD

The concept of matching outfits does not come from brand loyalty it comes from basic color theory PERIOD Blue skirts do not go with coral tops and I refuse to keep pretending like they do PERIOD Eventually you will end up putting your outfit underneath an oversized sweatshirt like we know you want to PERIOD What do you care if people know you are wearing pants

My Converse will be pried from my cold dead hands but I absolutely cannot defend wearing them for an entire day of classes PERIOD These are probably great for people who can do without any arch support but those of us unfit for military service are left to suffer PERIOD The Chuck is a timeless icon but they are also unreasonably impractical for a campus as spacious and uneven as ours PERIOD Senior fashion design and merchandising major Sara Murphy agrees PERIOD

 Murphy said PERIOD

Further on shoes unless someone is leaving immediately to go to work as a ranch hand or in a wet field there is no reason to wear cowgirl boots especially not on game days in September when the grass is dry and the heat pushes mid90 PERIOD I recognize that a wealth of people here are wearing cowgirl boots specifically because they do ranch andor wet field based work butfor the rest of us it is too hot to be wearing cowgirl boots above  degrees PERIOD Some people make the heat even worse by pairing them with leather skirts that raise the internal body temperature high enough to warrant a trip to the Longest Student Health Center or on game days when the health center is closed a trip to urgent care paid for out of pocket PERIOD

I will never shame modesty as a personal choice but thinking  and simultaneously wearing denim Bermuda shorts are directly oppositional PERIOD Laura Dern looked hot in Bermuda shorts in Jurassic Park PERIOD You are not Laura Dern PERIOD

Bermuda shorts might not crop up as much as other current trends but I have seen it enough to get middle school flashbacks PERIOD

 said Madge Maril with The Zoe Report PERIOD

Does this mean my opinion on Bermuda shorts makes me a bad feminist No women in the past wore the shorts and paid the fines so we could avoid having to do either of those things PERIOD

Good fashion trends also exist and Allie Middleton a junior fashion design and merchandising major had some more positive things to say about trends PERIOD

 Middleton said PERIOD

This much I will agree with using a tote bag as a backpack is the winning trend of Mississippi State Universitys current fashion climate PERIOD Everybody loves a tote PERIOD
